items.value: Kelly is waiting for your delivery!

Hiho my Name is Kelly,
Sergio told me that you do the delivery Job!?

i need:
1x Purploid
2x Greenbo

Get sure you dont have a full Inventory!
You will get 3 Items from me!
yes Kelly, i have the Fish with me!
i dont know what you are talking about!

Wonderful and as fresh as it is!
Thank you for your great delivery, please take this Special Delivery Box for Sergio and bring it to him. Of course you also get something!

You got:
1x Special Delivery Box (for Sergio)
10 x Earthworms (for you)
1 x roasted Greenbo (for you)
Thanks and see you soon Kelly!

Um ...?

I need the Fish!!!!.
Only with the Fish we can continue...

Required:
1x Purploid
2x Greenbo
Damn... i will be back soon!
